messages.subject: Re: Re: Another Chanukah Story
messages.msgSnippet: ... Please feel welcome!  Love to pass it around! And Shalom to you -- David -- John Taylor Gatto calls And the Skylark Sings with Me: Adventures in
messages.messageBody:
Robin Leuenberger wrote:

> From: Nest4Robin@... (Robin Leuenberger)
>
> David,
> Thanks for sharing the Chanukah Story. We celebrate Chanukah, and
> its always nice to have a new story to share with the children. If you
> don't mind I'd like to post it on the Noahide lists that I'm on.
> Shalom,
> Robin

Please feel welcome! Love to pass it around!

And Shalom to you --

David

--
John Taylor Gatto calls "And the Skylark Sings with Me: Adventures in
Homeschooling and Community-Based Education" "a treat you should not miss!"
To read a sample chapter, reviewers' comments, or the foreword, and to order
(cheaper than Amazon, and I'll sign it for you too!), visit my website at
http://www.skylarksings.com

messages.subject: Re: Another Chanukah Story
messages.msgSnippet: David, Thanks for sharing the Chanukah Story. We celebrate Chanukah, and its always nice to have a new story to share with the children.  If you don t mind I d
messages.messageBody:
David,
Thanks for sharing the Chanukah Story. We celebrate Chanukah, and
its always nice to have a new story to share with the children. If you
don't mind I'd like to post it on the Noahide lists that I'm on.
Shalom,
Robin
